history.proof: intros. apply app_inj_tail in H. destruct H as [H1 H2]. qsimpl use: map_eq_cons.

exceptions.tactic: intros X B A b a H.
intros X' B A b a H.
intros X' B' A b a H.
intros X' B' A' b a H.
intros X' B' A' b' a H.
intros X' B' A' b' a' H.

exceptions.exn: Unable to apply lemma of type "forall (A B : Type) (f : A -> B) (l : list A) (l' : list B) (b : B), [f p | p ∈ l] = b :: l' -> exists (a : A) (tl : list A), l = a :: tl /\\ f a = b /\\ [f p | p ∈ tl] = l'" on hypothesis of type "A = B".

original: intros X B A b a H. apply app_inj_tail in H. destruct H as [H1 H2]. apply map_eq_cons in H1. destruct H1 as [x [tl [H3 [H4 H5]]]]. split. - rewrite H3. apply map_eq_nil in H4. rewrite H4. reflexivity. - rewrite H5. reflexivity.
